***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8475?focusedCommentId=17084377) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I don't think we should delete it but definitely fix. I will take a look into it at some point in the future. 

As one comment, we will at some point want to create a `libarrow_thrift` where we collect all of our Thrift-depending code, so that we aren't having to statically link Thrift into more than one static library. Creating a JIRA about that
